results.content: Clint's course is just excellent. He covered all steps necessary, provided the tools and detailed guidance to creating a professional WP site! I'm looking forward to learning from other courses from this instructor when they come around.  Thanks Clint!!!

results.content: The instructor is so knowledgeable!  The real deal!  He takes you through every step of the process with clear and concise direction.  Everything is thoughtfully laid out and gone through in expert detail.  This course really goes above and beyond!  And unlike going through some sterile online courses, in this course not only are you gaining the knowledge and tools that you need, you are actually building a website as you go.  I recommend it to anyone who interested in starting or expanding their own web business!  It's money well spent!

response.content: Thanks for the awesome review John!

results.content: I am currently going through the course and the step by step instruction is fantastic.  Clint explains it very well and shows you every step you need to take.  I am also very pleased with the help outside of the course when something doesn't want to work right.  Clint is very prompt and helpful when something messes up.  I will give an updated review when I finish the course, but so far I am very happy I have purchased and started this one.

results.content: This course is packed with quality information. Clinton Gorman's courses have been a key component in the development of starting my online e-commerce shops. I would recommend any of his courses to anyone who is starting an online startup shop, e-commerce business, entrepreneur, and small business owners. I have been satisfied with my hosting at Jack Rabbit and Clintons quick response time to any questions that I have regarding my sites.

results.content: I've taken a different course from Clint and it was so well thought out and educating so when I heard he was making another, I had to try out his new one! This course shows you step-by-step how to tackle building a website and he doesn't skip a beat on anything. He is very thorough and concise about everything, which is great for those just learning on how to build a website or investigating a new hobby.
